title: The Most Optimistic Economy Since 1946 | 2/11/20
description:
Today is the New Hampshire Democratic primary, and a new Quinnipiac poll ranks Bernie Sanders as the front-runner. Joe Biden wants to be president as little as Colin Kaepernick wants to play football in the XFL. Bernie says there’s no room for pro-lifers in the Democrat Party. New Hampshire libertarians say they’ll vote for Bernie so he can lose to Trump. The economic “mood of the nation” is the highest Gallup has ever recorded as we switch from Obama’s “jobs saved” to Trump’s “jobs created.” But Bernie’s already preparing economy-halting executive orders, including the Green New Deal and banning crude oil exports. And in a leaked recording, Mike Bloomberg argued that all criminals look the same – young, male minorities.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
